data.name: Night Loops
data.detailed_description:
『 Hey there~ Ids at your service! 』




I know I look like any plain ol’ sheep, but in fact, we’ve known each other for quite some time now. How’re the hotel guests these days?

I’m here to tell you, there’s a whole ‘nother world below you actually. The only problem is, if you stay too long… you might stay forever… kinda like me. But this isn’t about me!

  • Solve intricate puzzles while befriending the inhabitants of a shadowy mansion.
  • Equip masks to gain the powers of their original owners.
  • Multiple endings.
  • At the end of each day, everything seems to reset – what does it truly mean to become the master of the mansion?

I got a hunch, kiddo…

~~~
A game by Jiaquarium
Original soundtrack by s3-z
Add’l art / design by Estella

data.short_description: A repeating journey through the psyche. Escape your night shift at the hotel, explore dreamlike worlds, and lose your sense of Self while reliving the time before dawn in this dark, adventure / puzzle game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10, and Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570, or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13+ (High Sierra)
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 5200 1536 MB, AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2GB, or Metal-capable equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
